Text:
Hey,
just thought i'd say that this is a great solutions manual. but if your doing it for assignments make sure not to copy exactly and check calculations, there are a few errors. when i took the class 17ppl got caught for cheating from these solutions and professor flipped. i did the questions for the wrong week, lol, thats about the only reason i didnt get caught. haha

Looking for the Intructors Solution Manual to Fundamentals of Engineering Thermodynamics 6th Edition by Moran and Shapiro?

The complete solutions for 14 chapters are in pdf format.

Feel free to email me at hocksiang [at] gmail [dot] com.

I'm actually looking for the solutions manual for Chemical, Biochemical, and Engineering Thermodynamics, 4th Edition by Stanley Sandler 

If NE1 finds it plz upload or send me d link @ technowiz007@ymail.com
thanks a bunch, its sooo helpful
